label: A4B3_cI14_229_c_b-001
title: Pt$_{3}$O$_{4}$ Structure
comments:
This is a simple defect superstructure of the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_cP2_221_a_b-002}{CsCl ($B2$) structure}. One atom has been removed from a $2 \times 2 \times 2$ supercell of CsCl. 
 (Muller, 1968) argue that the correct Pt$_{3}$O$_{4}$ structure is \href{current_web_home_dir/AB4C3_cP16_223_a_e_c-001}{NaPt$_{3}$O$_{4}$ with the sodium sites vacant}. 
 We use a = 6.226{\AA} (Galloni, 1941), but the ICSD entry sets a = 6.238{\AA}.
